text: College basketball teams were supposed to be celebrating Thanksgiving in the Bahamas, but the pandemic forced them to relocate. They happened to pick a part of the country with one of the worst Covid-19 outbreaks anywhere in the world: South Dakota. https://t.co/aDtjY9Oel9

name: WSJ
text: From @WSJopinion: There are effective approaches already in use outside the U.S. that can provide focused protection for the vulnerable and prevent transmission of viruses indoors, write @s_keshavjee and Tom Nicholson https://t.co/d5gHX9oFdE
